Haskell Wikiì—ì„œëŠ” Foldingì„ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì´ ì„¤ëª…í•˜ê³ ìˆë‹¤. In functional programming, fold (or reduce) is a family of higher order functions that process a data structure in some order and build a return value.
